S04ajitsvyu:2_0: athāyuṣmān ānando bhagavata imā gāthā bhāṣitvā tūṣṇīṃ sthito 'bhūt* /
S04ajitsvyu:2_1: atha bhagavān* śrāvastyāṃ mahānagaryāṃ nātidūre sthito 'bhūt* /
S04ajitsvyu:2_2: atha te sarve gavākṣatoraṇaniryūhakā [hiraṇya]mayāḥ sphaṭikamayā rūpyamayāḥ prādurabhūvan* /
S04ajitsvyu:2_3: tathā śrāvastyāṃ ma[hānagaryāṃ] mahāntaṃ janakāyaṃ saṃsthito 'bhūvan* /
S04ajitsvyu:2_4: atha sa janakāyaḥ saṃśayajāto babhūva ko hetuḥ kaḥ pratyayaḥ nagarasya śubhanimittaṃ prādurabhūt* /
S04ajitsvyu:2_6: atha tatra janakāye anekavarṣaśatasahasriko (Asv 105) jīrṇo vṛddho mahallakaḥ puruṣaḥ saṃsthito 'bhūt* /
S04ajitsvyu:2_7: atha sa puruṣas taṃ janakāyaṃ samāśvāsayann evam āha /

S04ajitsvyu:2_9: tatra śākyamunir nāma tathāgato 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddho vidyācaraṇasaṃpannaḥ sugato lokavid anuttaraḥ puruṣadamyasārathiḥ śāstā devānāṃ ca manuṣyāṇāṃ
S04ajitsvyu:2_10: ca buddho bhagavān* / so 'yaṃ śrāvastīṃ mahānagarīṃ piṇḍāya prāviśat* /

S04ajitsvyu:2_13: yat tasya bhagavatas tathāgatasyārhataḥ samyaksaṃbuddhasya gu[ṇavarṇasamudīraṇa]samaye idaṃ śubhanimittam abhūt* /
S04ajitsvyu:2_14: dṛṣṭamātrasya tasya tathāgatasyārhataḥ samyaksaṃbuddhasya kīdṛśaḥ puṇyābhisaṃskāro bhaviṣyati /
S04ajitsvyu:2_15: atha sa jīrṇakapuruṣas taṃ janakāyaṃ bhagavato guṇavarṇasamudīraṇatayā gāthābhir adhyabhāṣata /

S04ajitsvyu:4_4_1: pratiṣṭhāpitāni caturaśītisatvakoṭīniyutaśatasahasrāṇy ābhiratyā lo[kadhāto]r akṣobhyatathāgatasya buddhakṣetraṃ pratiṣṭhāpitāni /
S04ajitsvyu:4_5: atha bhagavān ā[nandena saha nagarā]valambikāyā dārikāyā gṛhe samāgato 'bhūt* /
S04ajitsvyu:4_6: atha bhagavān nagarāvalambikāyā dārikāyā gṛhe cakrikaṃ kaṭakaṭāpayām āsa /
S04ajitsvyu:4_7: atha sā dārikā taṃ cakrīśabdaṃ śrutvā saṃśayajātābhūt* /
S04ajitsvyu:4_8: ko hetuḥ kaḥ pratyayaḥ / mama gṛhe na kadācit piṇḍapātika āgato 'bhūt* /
S04ajitsvyu:4_9: atha sā nagarāvalambikā dārikā śūnyākāragṛhe niṣaṇṇā aśrukaṇṭhī rudantī paridevantī sthitābhūt tīkṣṇadhāram asiṃ gaveṣantī paridevantī rudantī sthitābhūt* /

S04ajitsvyu:6_0: atha sa nagarāvalambikā dārikā śūnyākāragṛhe [niṣaṇṇā] imā gāthā bhāṣitvā tūṣṇīṃ sthitābhūt* /
S04ajitsvyu:6_1: atha śuddhavāsakāyiko devaputro 'ntarīkṣagataḥ sthitaś cintayati sma /
S04ajitsvyu:6_2: paśyec ced imāṃ bhagavān* / anekaduṣkarakoṭiniyutaśatasahasracīrṇacaritaḥ sa śākyamunis tathāgato nagarāvalambikāyā dārikāyā gṛhe sthito 'bhūt* /
S04ajitsvyu:6_3_0: atha śuddhavāsakāyiko devaputraḥ śatasahasramūlyaṃ muktāhāraṃ gṛhītvā śatarasabhojanapiṭakaṃ gṛhītvā kāśikāni vastrāṇi gṛhītvā
S04ajitsvyu:6_4: atha śuddhavāsakāyiko devaputro nagarāvalambikāṃ dārikām evam āha /
S04ajitsvyu:6_5: prāvara dārike imāni kāśikāni vastrāṇi imāny anekaśatasahasramūlyāny ābharaṇāni /
S04ajitsvyu:6_6: prāvṛtya cedaṃ śatasahasramūlyaṃ muktāhāraṃ gṛhītvā imaṃ śatarasabhojanapiṭakaṃ gṛhītvā bhagavantam upanāmaya /
S04ajitsvyu:6_7: atha sā dārikā tāni kāśikāni vastrāṇi prāvṛtya śatasahasramūlyaṃ muktāhāraṃ gṛhītvā taṃ śatarasabhojanapiṭakaṃ gṛhītvā yena bhagavāṃs tenopasaṃkrāntā /
S04ajitsvyu:6_8: bhagavantam upanāmayati sma / atha bhagavāṃs tāṃ nagarāvalambikām evam āha /
S04ajitsvyu:6_9: pariṇāmaya tvaṃ dārike yathā pariṇāmitaṃ vipaśyiśikhiviśvabhukkakutsundakanakamunikāśyapaprabhṛtibhiḥ sadbhis tathāgatair arhadbhiḥ samyaksaṃbuddhaiḥ /
S04ajitsvyu:6_10: anto bhaviṣyati strībhāvād anto bhaviṣyati daridragṛhāt* /

S04ajitsvyu:6_18: atha sā nagarāvalambikā dārikā bhagava[ntaṃ gā]thābhir adhyabhāṣata /

S04ajitsvyu:9_10_1: nāma tathāgato 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddho vidyācaraṇasaṃpannaḥ sugato lokavid anuttaraḥ puruṣadamyasārathiḥ śāstā devānāṃ ca manuṣyāṇāṃ
S04ajitsvyu:9_11: atha sā dārikā bhagavantaṃ triḥ pradakṣiṇaṃ kṛtvaivam āha /

S04ajitsvyu:9_16: atha ca sā dārikā tuṣṭā udagrā āttamanāḥ pramuditā prītisaumasyajātā svagṛhagamanam ārabdhā /

S04ajitsvyu:9_19: kālaṃ kṛtvā / pūrvasyān diśi magadhaviṣaye rājā ajitaseno nāma /

S04ajitsvyu:9_23: atha bhagavān paścimakena nagaradvāreṇa śrāvastyā mahānagaryā niṣkrānto yena jetavanaṃ vihāras tenopasaṃkrāntaḥ /

S04ajitsvyu:11_0: athāyuṣmān ānanda imā gāthā bhāṣitvā bhagavantaṃ triḥpradakṣiṇīkṛtya bhagavataḥ puratas tasthau /
S04ajitsvyu:11_1: atha bhagavān āyuṣmantam ānandam āmantrayate sma /
S04ajitsvyu:11_2: gacchānanda gaṇḍīm ākoṭaya / te śrāvakāḥ paribhokṣyanti piṇḍapātam* /

S04ajitsvyu:11_6: ye kecid ānanda gaṇḍīśabdaṃ śroṣyanti teṣāṃ pañcānantaryāṇi kṛtyāni parīkṣayaṃ yāsyanti /
S04ajitsvyu:11_7: avaivartikās te bhaviṣyanti kṣipraṃ cānuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbhotsyante /
S04ajitsvyu:11_8: ānanda āha / kīdṛśaṃ bhagavaṃs taiḥ satvaiḥ kuśalamūlam avaropitam* /
S04ajitsvyu:11_9_0: bhagavān āha / śṛṇu ānanda ye satvāḥ paścime kāle paścime samaye mama parinirvṛtasya saddharmavipralope vartamāne saddharmasyāntardhānakālasamaye
S04ajitsvyu:11_10: ye satvā [vā] araṇyāyatane gaṇḍyākoṭanaśabdaṃ śroṣyanti namo buddhāyeti kariṣyanti teṣāṃ pañcānantaryāṇi karmāṇi parikṣayaṃ (Asv 115) yāsyanti /
S04ajitsvyu:11_12: athāyuṣmān ānandaḥ śāntapraśāntena gaṇḍīm ākoṭayate sma /
S04ajitsvyu:11_13: atha tena gaṇdīśabdena sarve te mahāśrāvakāḥ sannipatitā abhūvan* /
S04ajitsvyu:11_14: yathā yathā āsane niṣaṇṇāḥ piṇḍapātaṃ paribhuñjante sma /
S04ajitsvyu:11_15: atha tatraiva śrāvakamadhye nandimitro nāma mahāśrāvakaḥ sannipatito 'bhūt* sanniṣaṇṇaḥ /
S04ajitsvyu:11_16: atha bhagavān āyuṣmantaṃ nandimitraṃ mahāśrāvakam āmantrayate sma /
S04ajitsvyu:11_17: gaccha tvaṃ nandimitra mahāśrāvaka pūrvasyān diśi magadhaviṣaye rājño 'jitasenasya kalyāṇamitraparicaryāṃ kuru /
S04ajitsvyu:11_18: atha nandimitro mahāśrāvako bhagavantam evam āha /
S04ajitsvyu:11_19: na bhagavan* śakṣyāmas taṃ pṛthivīpradeśaṃ gantum* /

S04ajitsvyu:11_23: atha nandimitro mahāśrāvakaḥ pratyūṣakālasamaye suvarṇavarṇaṃ vastraṃ prāvṛtya yena pūrvasyān diśi magadhaviṣaye rājño 'jitasenasya rājadhānī tenānukrānto 'bhūt* /

S04ajitsvyu:11_30: mama rājñā kiṃ kāryaṃ mama rājā kiṃ kariṣyati /
S04ajitsvyu:11_33: na ca sa bhikṣus tava pārśve āgacchati
S04ajitsvyu:11_35: na ca sa bhikṣū rājño 'jitasenasya pārśvam āgacchati /

S04ajitsvyu:11_40: atha rājñājitasenena nandimitrasya bhikṣoḥ siṃhāsanaṃ dattam abhūt* /
